data.title: Gross
data.text: Rude service. Lousy food - it stays on the steam table for ever.  Do your digestive system a favor - find somewhere else to eat.  No clue how they stay in business. Horrible.  Just gross.

data.title: Nostalgia - Same as the 1970s!!
data.text: Wow, I ate here in April 2016 and nothing has really changed over the last 40+ years!!!    I remember stopping here on the way home from our lake home every Sunday evening for dinner.   The food is still wonderful and the service excellent.    It fulfilled my yearning for childhood memories and started new memories for my college age children.

data.title: Very disappointing
data.text: I was excited to have a new Asian restaurant in the area, but then I ate there. The food looked old in the case, the sauce seemed to be congealed on all of them. I tried the General Tso's. It was awful. The rice noodles were fine. The egg roll was the worst I have ever had. I would not recommend this establishment.

data.title: Well done!
data.text: This is a great location and a very nice portion. The cost is around $7.00 per person and they do a great job at this location.
